series.title: Grey's Anatomy
series.about: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

series.title: One Tree Hill
series.about: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

series.title: The Vampire Diaries
series.about: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

series.title: The 100
series.about: Set ninety-seven years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends one hundred juvenile delinquents back to Earth, in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.

series.title: The bold type
series.about: A glimpse into the outrageous lives and loves of those responsible for a global women's magazine.
